title: Error message "CMS connection: Invalid URL or port"
content:
When configuring CMS Gateway in Suite Administration, the following error is shown.

Cause

The UCMDB Gateway URL or port is invalid.

Solution

Make sure the UCMDB Gateway connection parameters are valid and the Gateway service is running. In addition, UCMDB Gateway requires SSL/TLS, so make sure HTTPS is used rather than HTTP even if HTTP is enabled on the UCMDB side.
